page.title: 09RADIO CITY MATHS QUIZ
page.content: The quiz was started by & was the idea of Ian Porteus.It was put into action by Mathematical Education on Merseyide in conjunction with Royal Insurance. It consists of 7 different rounds,2 are where you are given individul questions,2 are where the first person to buzz & give the correct answer gets 2 points;if they answer it wrongly the other team can either take a point or have a go for the 2 points themselves.There are also 2 music rounds,& a round where you must answer as many questions as you can in a minute. To qualify you must win your local league & the last 8 qualifiers rounds are recorded.This year our team took part for the 1st time,& were beaten in the final !
